title: Manage Certificate Objects
description: Cloud NGFW uses certificates to access an intelligent feed and to enable outbound decryption. These certificates are stored in the [AWS Secrets Manager](https://docs.aws.amazon.com/secretsmanager/latest/userguide/intro.html).
